stories.text:
I'm curious, are there any tweets that are actually valuable and insightful enough to make the whole thing worth spending time on?

Have you ever read a tweet that made a meaningful positive impact on your life?

Can you share some examples of tweets that are actually worth reading?
stories.title: Ask HN: Have you ever read a tweet that made a meaningful impact on your life?

stories.text:
Hi, recently I've been trying to self-study Computer Science. The networking textbook (Computer Networking: a Top Down Approach) I'm using has a free online resource called knowledge checks (http://gaia.cs.umass.edu/kurose_ross/knowledgechecks/index.php) and I'm loving it <3. I find it better than normal assignments due to it's immediate feedback

I'm wondering if other educators make these kind of resources as well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Educators, do you use knowledge checks?
Creating the new hydrogen economy is an undertaking
